reviews.title: Addicting
reviews.comment: Ever consider a non violent video game? Here it is!!! Play it and watch yourself try to beat the highscore!
reviews.author: Merp Bushta

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Dont listen to the other noobs. The ads are kinda annoying but they dont always happend. This I very addictive and its just AWESOME YOU BETTER GET THIS oh and also make unlimited magnet I thought about it and you should make it . Updates and more games. Keep it up guys
reviews.author: Jinsung Park

reviews.title: Was great, recent update killed it
reviews.comment: This was an awesome app, then the 2 most recent updates took out the unlimited magnet (which was my motivation for playing) and it added ads. I would love for an option to pay to remove ads, and please bring back the magnet.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: new characters?
reviews.comment: I like the game but no updates? can u get better characters? maybe knock offs of well known characters.  Mickey mouse, Mario, sonic, etc.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: 99% mice
reviews.comment: Puts some weapons to kill mice in there  but its mice not nice
reviews.author: Aysha Akthar

reviews.title: Fun but repetitive
reviews.comment: The game is fun but gets repetitive after a while. There should be more stages and difficulties. Otherwise the game is worth downloading.
reviews.author: Jacob Farr

reviews.title: Great Game/Ads
reviews.comment: I really love ads. A few here n there is ok. I LOVE Apps that constantly have adds, Continuously make u have to manually close to continue with a game, even covering up control buttons and mostly- *adding apps to ur phone when u never downloaded them. If u like to have ur battery eaten, bog down a bunch of storage space n c adds when ur not even playing the game-*get this app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Swipe til you drop!
reviews.comment: Lightweight game with a simple premise that has great replayability. I can play this over and over during my free time and i won\'t get tired, especially because it is not easy at all. Great free game in my opinion!
reviews.author: L Castillo F

reviews.title: LOVE IT.
reviews.comment: Usually, I don\'t do reviews, but this is an exception. I\'ve had this app for about a week now, and I think it\'s fantastic. I love the music, that action esque 8-bit replica music, along with the graphics. The game is extremely addicting, and the gameplay is fast paced and fun. All in all, I think this app is excellent, and anyone who wants a good time passer should try it out.
reviews.author: alberto corral

reviews.title: Great game, horrid ads.
reviews.comment: I absolutely love the game. Feels fluid, fun controls, and just the right amount of challenge. Graphics, music, etc. are all fitting and well done.  The reason it doesn\'t get a 5 is the incessant use of ads and the obnoxious high score system they use, both of which constantly pop up in notifications or any time you change screens in the game. Please make a paid version to at least get rid of the ads.
reviews.author: Marcos Alfonso

reviews.title: Uninstalled because of ads.
reviews.comment: This used to be a good game but it was ruined thanks to the developer\'s greed with the obtrusive ads.  1 out of 5 until ads are implemented properly.  Maybe I can find a previous version of this game floating around somewhere online.
reviews.author: Sonic Hedgehog

reviews.title: Good game, bad ads
reviews.comment: I hate it when people complain about ads with 2 exceptions, when they pop up and/or block the game, and when it\'s irrelevant and repetitive.  The \"Download This App To Save Your Score\" pop up at the end of each Endless Mode is the perfect example of annoyance. It also appears whenever you get a high score.  It\'s worth the download, but I would appreciate fixing the ad placement and timing.

reviews.title: Simple.Fun.Addictive
reviews.comment: One of the best games I have seen on the market! Other games like Bejeweled are fun but the gameplay is boring and repetitive. It is just \'Look at the colors, align the colours, look at the colors, align the colours, look at the colors, align the colors\' as your brain slowly turns to yoghurt but with this game it has randomized gameplay keeping it fresh!
reviews.author: Bruce Smith

reviews.title: Game might be good but
reviews.comment: I can\'t play for a minute without seeing ads of some type.
reviews.author: Brandon Wellberg

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: I don\'t know what it is about this game but it is so addicting, simple to learn, impossible to master
reviews.author: aj cadell

reviews.title: Ridiculously Addictive
reviews.comment: Love this game,it\'s simple and fun. It would be better if they gave you an option to remove all the adds
reviews.author: Jacqueline Lopez

reviews.title: Addictive
reviews.comment: Pixel games are awesome and so is this app
reviews.author: George Barajas

reviews.comment: Amazing game!! Could use some new rooms and power-ups thought...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Loved it
reviews.comment: update caused the infinite magnet perk to vanish.my hard work all wasted,my 34000 coins ,what to do with it?
reviews.author: James Varghese

reviews.title: Fun game
reviews.comment: It is a fun game that i like
reviews.author: Jeremy Bjork
